ruleset.name: Best Practices
ruleset.description: Rules which enforce generally accepted best practices.

rule.name: DestroyCursorRule
rule.message: Ensure that IDataCursor is destroyed after use
rule.description: Ensure that IDataCursor are always destroyed after use. Failing to do so might result in resource leaks.

rule.name: DisabledFlowElementRule
rule.message: Flow service {0} has disabled flow step at {1}
rule.description: Makes sure there is no disabled code in flow service.

rule.name: DuplicateDocumentFieldRule
rule.message: Ensure that there is no duplicate field defined in document type {0}
rule.description: Makes sure no duplicate field is defined in document type.

rule.name: DuplicateSignatureField
rule.message: Ensure that there is no duplicate field defined in signature of service {0}
rule.description: Makes sure no duplicate field is defined in service signature.

rule.name: RestoreDebugPipelineRule
rule.message: Service {0} has debug pipeline property set to restore
rule.description: Service debug pipeline property should not be set to restore.

rule.name: SingleTopLevelFolderRule
rule.message: Ensure there is only one folder at top level
rule.description: Ensure there is only one folder at top level.

rule.name: UndefinedVariableRule
rule.message: Variable {0} mapped at {1} is not defined{2}in Flow Service {3}
rule.description: Makes sure no duplicate field is defined in document type.

rule.name: UniqueTopLevelFolderRule
rule.message: Ensure the top level folder {0} has the same name as package name
rule.description: Ensure the name of top level folder is the same with package name.
